title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6661.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6661.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Chapter, the following words shall
have the specified meanings: (a) Office means the New York State Office for the Aging. (b) Senior citizen services center means a
community facility which provides to older adults a combination of services, including the provisions of health, social, educational and recreational
services. (c) Child day-care center
means a community facility which provides care to a child aged 6 weeks to 14
years for a portion of the day, and less than 24 hours outside the home, in a
facility licensed and approved in accordance with applicable local, State and

Federal standards for child day care. (d) Residential health-care facility means a
facility certified under article 28 of the Public Health Law. (e) Combined center shall mean an entity
receiving or applying to receive funds under this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6661.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
